3) Cross-functional collaboration: you partner well with stakeholders (product/ops/engineering depending on the role) and can influence without heavy process.

What success looks like in the first 3–6 months:
- First 30 days: ramp on our domain and tooling, build relationships with key partners, and ship at least one small but meaningful improvement.
- By ~60 days: independently own a core project/workstream with clear milestones; stakeholders see you as the go-to person for that area.
- By ~90–180 days: deliver 1–2 high-impact outcomes (measured by agreed KPIs such as cycle time reduction, revenue/retention uplift, quality/defect reduction, or operational cost/time savings—depending on the specific team) and establish a repeatable process so the impact persists.
